code: import React from"react";import styles from'./Block2.module.scss';import{Text}from"./Text";import pic from'../img/pana.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SecondBlock=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.Block2,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.Block2__TextColom,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{text1:"Welcome to Learn",text2:"Marketing!",tmp:"0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{text1:"Are you ready to boost your",text2:"marketing skills!?",tmp:"1"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:styles.Block2__TextColom__Btn,children:"Buy now"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.Block2__PicBlock,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:pic,alt:"",className:styles.Block2__PicBlock__Img})})]});};export{SecondBlock};
